amendment.description: Amendment prohibits a post-grant review from being instituted based upon the best mode requirement of patent law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-319 to prohibit a post-grant review from being instituted based upon the best mode requirement of patent law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pence amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Pence.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pence amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
